verses.verse: And the life of Sarah <S%H8283><s%> was <S%H2416><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: these were the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Sarah <S%H8283><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> his dead <S%H4191><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
